html: <html xmlns:v="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:vml" xmlns:o="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" xmlns:w="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:word" xmlns:m="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/2004/12/omml" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40"> <head> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8"> <meta name="Generator" content="Microsoft Word 14 (filtered medium)"> <style></style> </head> <body lang="EN-US" link="blue" vlink="purple"> <div class="WordSection1"> <p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal">Hi Melissa, <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal">Could you please help with the below clarifications: <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l3 level1 lfo2"> <span style="mso-list:Ignore">1)<span style="font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span> Required fields: It is mentioned in the SDS DOC, that the mediator should check for the required fields, when workflow is not able to check for it <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:.25in">Please let us know the scenarios that work flow would not be to catch the required fields and the XEN would be fired to mediator. <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:.25in"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l3 level1 lfo2"> <span style="mso-list:Ignore">2)<span style="font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span> What are the conditions for Initials transmission and Repair flow.&nbsp; For Repair, is it going to Add Document/Add Note (or) Update event.&nbsp; If it is going to Add document, we will not be able to annotate the document and then send it. As soon as the document is updated, the transmission will be initiated. <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l3 level1 lfo2"> <span style="mso-list:Ignore">3)<span style="font:7.0pt  &quot;Times New Roman&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span> What are the document types that mediator needs to whitelist. <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l3 level1 lfo2"> <span style="mso-list:Ignore">4)<span style="font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span> With this project, when we do the initial transmission, the BPO system create a L1 work item and send it back to Mediator. &nbsp;Could we have a TSF for &#x2018;<span style="color:#333333;background:yellow;mso-highlight:yellow">Level 1 Work Item</span><span style="color:#333333">&#x2019; to store the level 1 work item returned by BPO team. </span> <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="color:#1F497D"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="color:#1F497D"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo3"> <span style="font-family:Symbol"><span style="mso-list:Ignore">�<span style="font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span> Required fields: It is mentioned in the SDS DOC, that the mediator should check for the required fields, when workflow is not able to check for it <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; For Repair, is it going to Add Document/Add Note (or) Update event.&nbsp; If it is going to Add document, we will not be able to annotate the document and then send it. As soon as the document is updated, the transmission will be initiated. <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo3"> <span style="font-family:Symbol"><span style="mso-list:Ignore">�<span style="font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span> What are the document types that mediator needs to whitelist. <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo3"> <span style="font-family:Symbol"><span style="mso-list:Ignore">�<span style="font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span> With this project, when we do the initial transmission, the BPO system create a L1 work item and send it back to Mediator. &nbsp;Could we have a TSF for &#x2018;<span style="color:#333333;background:yellow;mso-highlight:yellow">Level 1 Work Item</span><span style="color:#333333">&#x2019; to store the level 1 work item returned by BPO team.</span> <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo4"> <span style="font-family:Wingdings"><span style="mso-list:Ignore">�<span style="font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;">&nbsp;</span></span></span> Required fields: It is mentioned in the SDS DOC, that the mediator should check for the required fields, when workflow is not able to check for it <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; For Repair, is it going to Add Document/Add Note (or) Update event.&nbsp; If it is going to Add document, we will not be able to annotate the document and then send it. As soon as the document is updated, the transmission will be initiated. <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo4"> <span style="font-family:Wingdings"><span style="mso-list:Ignore">�<span style="font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;">&nbsp;</span></span></span> What are the document types that mediator needs to whitelist. <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo4"> <span style="font-family:Wingdings"><span style="mso-list:Ignore">�<span style="font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;">&nbsp;</span></span></span> With this project, when we do the initial transmission, the BPO system create a L1 work item and send it back to Mediator. &nbsp;Could we have a TSF for &#x2018;<span style="color:#333333;background:yellow;mso-highlight:yellow">Level 1 Work Item</span><span style="color:#333333">&#x2019; to store the level 1 work item returned by BPO team.</span> <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l2 level1 lfo5"> <span style="font-family:Wingdings"><span style="mso-list:Ignore">v<span style="font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;">&nbsp;</span></span></span> Required fields: It is mentioned in the SDS DOC, that the mediator should check for the required fields, when workflow is not able to check for it <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l2 level1 lfo5"> <span style="font-family:Wingdings"><span style="mso-list:Ignore">v<span style="font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;">&nbsp;</span></span></span> What are the conditions for Initials transmission and Repair flow.&nbsp; For Repair, is it going to Add Document/Add Note (or) Update event.&nbsp; If it is going to Add document, we will not be able to annotate the document and then send it. As soon as the document is updated, the transmission will be initiated. <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l2 level1 lfo5"> <span style="font-family:Wingdings"><span style="mso-list:Ignore">v<span style="font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;">&nbsp;</span></span></span> What are the document types that mediator needs to whitelist. <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l2 level1 lfo5"> <span style="font-family:Wingdings"><span style="mso-list:Ignore">v<span style="font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;">&nbsp;</span></span></span> With this project, when we do the initial transmission, the BPO system create a L1 work item and send it back to Mediator. &nbsp;Could we have a TSF for &#x2018;<span style="color:#333333;background:yellow;mso-highlight:yellow">Level 1 Work Item</span><span style="color:#333333">&#x2019; to store the level 1 work item returned by BPO team.</span> <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="color:#1F497D"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="color:#943634">Thanks and regards, <o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="color:#943634">Loganathan Karunakaran <o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="color:#943634">Mob: +1- 385-528-6636 <o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="color:#943634">Office:+1-801-537-2383 <o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal"> <o:p> &nbsp; </o:p></p></div></body></html>
